safe_get_block(pos, default_block)¶

Getter (safe version)

This function returns default_block if pos is out of area.

Parameters:
  • pos (tuple of two ints) – target block position
  • default_block (Block) – default block when pos is out of area
Returns:

corresponding block or default_block
Return type:

Block

yender.renderer module¶

yender.renderer.box_triangles(color)¶

Make triangles of a box

Parameters:color (tuple of three ints) – triangle color
Returns:tuple of triangles and colors
yender.renderer.raytrace(image_size, origin, f, yaw, pitch, triangles, colors)¶

Render image with raytracing

Parameters:
  • image_size (Tuple of two ints) – (width, height)
  • origin (Tuple of three ints) – the start point (x, y, z) of rays
  • f (float) – focal length
  • yaw (float) – camera yaw (angle)
  • pitch (float) – camera pitch (angle)
  • triangles – triangles[i] corresponding to colors[i]
  • colors – colors[i] corresponding to triangles[i]
Returns:

rendered image (channel, x, y)
Return type:

list of list of list of int
yender.renderer.tile_triangles(color)¶

Make triangles of a tile

Parameters:color (tuple of three ints) – triangle color
Returns:tuple of triangles and colors
